snippet: As President Nicolas Sarkozy heads into a tough re-election fight, he is increasingly relying on Ramon Fernandez, a civil servant few people outside France have ever heard of.
abstract: French Pres Nicolas Sarkozy, heading into tough re-election fight, is increasingly relying on Treasury head Ramon Fernandez for financial damage control; he has emerged as one of country's top power brokers; France is widely expected to lose its vaunted AAA credit rating shortly.
lead_paragraph: As President Nicolas Sarkozy heads into a tough re-election fight, he is increasingly relying on Ramon Fernandez, a civil servant few people outside France have ever heard of.

headline.seo: France’s Treasury Chief Works to Guard Credit Rating
headline.main: In Euro Zone’s Crisis, Technocrat in Paris Works Behind the Scenes
